metadata.description: TWO COMPLETE STORIES AT LESS THAN HALF THE PRICE OF TWO COMICS! Two full-length stories in one double-length flip book! First, a desperate monk pits a band of savage Vikings against a pack of rabid vampires in a frantic attempt to protect an exceptionally precious child. In the second story, a woman trapped on a space station overrun by aliens must chose whether to save the second seat on her two-person escape pod for her aloof but heroic husband or for her passionate, forbidden lover.
metadata.name: Love Stories (to Die For)
